result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operator Flee/Elude Officer-Bodily Harm or Property Damage

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Deshandre L Brister

records.addlTxt: Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Status Report 11-1-22

Defendant Deshandre L Brister not in court.  Attorney Brett Lee Copeland in court for Deshandre L Brister.  Prosecuting attorney Thomas Hasle in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness was present Mr Brister logged into the zoom meeting, but did not remain connected until his case was called.  Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for Preliminary Hearing in Branch PE.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for November 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Supervision Report 10-13-22

Defendant Deshandre L Brister in court in person.  Attorney Brett Lee Copeland appeared by video for Deshandre L Brister.  Prosecuting attorney Arthur Kenneth Thexton in court in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case is set for a Preliminary Hearing. Defense Counsel is newly appointed and requests an adjournment. Case is adjourned. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Supervision Report - 09-14-2022
State Public Defender - Order Appointing Counsel.  Received and Filed.  nk

Defendant Deshandre L Brister in court in person.  Abby Rockendorf appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Supervision Report 7-27-22

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  No driving without a valid license.

Defendant Deshandre L Brister in court with attorney Connor Romenesko.  Defendant Deshandre L Brister in custody.  Dax Odom appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deshandre L Brister appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Grayson, Branch 16. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Deshandre L Brister
Current: 3307 N 44th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53209   (Effective: 07-20-2022)
Prior: 5041 N. 32nd Street, Milwaukee, WI
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
